vite:css
transforms.result: em{font-style:normal}.check{line-height:1;min-height:20px;padding-left:26px;position:relative}.check,.check>*{display:inline-block}.check>*{line-height:1.4;vertical-align:middle}.check input{margin:0 0 0 1px;position:absolute}.check .label:after,.check .label:before{content:"";display:inline-block;position:absolute}.check input[type=checkbox],.check input[type=radio]{opacity:0}.check input[type=radio],.check input[type=radio]+.label:before{background-color:#fff;border:1px solid #ccc;border-radius:50%;box-sizing:border-box;height:20px;left:0;top:0;width:20px}.check input[type=radio]:checked+.label:after{background-color:#333;border-radius:50%;box-sizing:border-box;height:14px;left:3px;top:3px;width:14px}.check input[type=checkbox],.check input[type=checkbox]+.label:before{background-color:#fff;border:1px solid #ccc;box-sizing:border-box;height:20px;left:0;top:0;width:20px}.check input[type=checkbox]:checked+.label:after{border:2px solid #333;border-left:0;border-top:0;height:13px;left:6px;top:1px;transform:rotate(45deg);width:8px}.check_ani{display:inline-block;position:relative}.check_ani input{margin:0 0 0 1px;opacity:0;position:absolute}.check_ani input[type=checkbox]{opacity:0}.check_ani .label{display:block;min-height:22px;padding-left:48px;position:relative}.check_ani .label:before{background-color:#ccc;border:0;border-radius:60px;content:"";display:inline-block;height:22px;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:42px}.check_ani input[type=checkbox]+.label:after{background-color:#fff;border-radius:50%;content:"";display:block;height:18px;left:2px;position:absolute;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%);transition:all .2s;width:18px;z-index:1}.check_ani input[type=checkbox]:checked+.label:before{background-color:#ff7200}.check_ani input[type=checkbox]:checked+.label:after{left:22px}label.input,label.select>div{display:block;position:relative}label.input i{color:#aaa;font-size:16px;font-style:normal;left:15px;line-height:18px;position:absolute;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%)}label.input input[type=number],label.input input[type=password],label.input input[type=text]{font-size:16px;line-height:18px;width:100%}label.input .err_txt{color:#ff7200;display:none;font-size:12px;line-height:18px;margin-top:5px}label.input.err .err_txt{display:block}label.input *{flex:1 auto}.label_wrap{flex:1;position:relative}.label_wrap button[class*=icon_]{border-radius:50%;display:none;font-size:0;height:24px;position:absolute;right:15px;top:9px;width:24px;z-index:1}.label_wrap button[class*=icon_]+button[class*=icon_]{margin-right:34px}.label_wrap button[class*=icon_]{background-image:url(__VITE_ASSET__BaA4KOYi__);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:250px auto}.label_wrap button.icon_del{background-position:0 0}.label_wrap button.icon_pass{background-position:-80px 0}.label_wrap button.icon_text{background-position:-40px 0}
